definition: to undertake to rectify any deficiencies in the quality of a building, product or service/warranty/guarantee
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Fuan lift truck is premium quality, one year guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 富立安堆高机优质服务，保固一年。

sentences.english: During the warranty period, if the product fails, the sellers will do minor repairs for the product.
sentences.chinese: 若产品在保固期内失效时，则卖方为产品做小修。

sentences.english: This purchase is covered by a fully comprehensive five-year warranty.
sentences.chinese: 这件商品包含一个五年综合的保固。

sentences.english: The computer comes with a three-year warranty.
This warranty shall not apply to any unit that has been repaired or altered other than by the manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 此保固不包含已送修过或别制造商改过的部份。

sentences.english: This product comes with one year warranty .
sentences.chinese: 这产品有一年的保固期。

sentences.english: A five-year warranty is characteristic of most expensive wrist-watches.
sentences.chinese: 一些最昂贵的腕表都有五年的保固。

sentences.english: Your warranty is invalid without an official registration stamp.
sentences.chinese: 您的保固书没盖官方注册章所以无效。

sentences.english: One characteristic of a good purchase is a comprehensive warranty.
sentences.chinese: 好货品的特点之一就是有全方位的保固。

sentences.english: The printer has a one-year warranty, so I have the right to do so.
sentences.chinese: 这台印表机有一年的保固期，所以我有权这么做。

sentences.english: We offer 3-year limited warranty for all our LED power supply products.
sentences.chinese: 我们的LED电源供应器均提供三年品质保固。

sentences.english: Please refer to Guidelines for safe and efficient use and Limited Warranty.
sentences.chinese: 请参考安全及有效使用指导及有限保固两章中的说明。

sentences.english: One year free maintenance service is granted for the troubles resulting from normal use within the warranty period.
sentences.chinese: 保固期内，于正常使用下出现的故障，免费维修。

definition: to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
Xingren county in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔西南州[Qian2 xi1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to die of old age/to live to a ripe old age/(fig.) (of sth) to come to an end (after a long period of service)
reign name of Qing emperor (1850-1861)/Xianfeng county in Enshi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Hubei
